title: What is the purpose of cross-validation in machine learning?
options: To split the dataset into training and testing sets
To evaluate the performance of a model on unseen data
To handle missing values in the dataset
To select the optimal hyperparameters for a model

title: Which algorithm is used for training deep neural networks with multiple layers?
options: Logistic regression
Naive Bayes
Support Vector Machines (SVM)
Backpropagation algorithm

title: What is the purpose of the AUC-ROC curve in binary classification?
options: To visualize the decision boundary of a classifier
To measure the balance between precision and recall
To compare the performance of different classifiers
To evaluate the performance of a classifier at various probability thresholds

title: Which algorithm is commonly used for collaborative filtering in recommendation systems?
options: K-nearest neighbors (KNN)
Support Vector Machines (SVM)
Decision trees
Linear regression

title: What is the purpose of regularization techniques in machine learning?
options: To reduce overfitting and improve model generalization
To increase model complexity and accuracy
To speed up the training process
To handle missing data in the dataset
